${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Switch to Passive Optical LAN to cut costs and boost performance How many times have you heard: better, faster, cheaper – you can have two but not all three.
That’s not true with Passive Optical LAN. This next-generation local area network solution certainly brings better performance: up to 1 Gb/s to every occupant in a building. And its lightweight, flexible fiber optic cabling is definitely quicker to deploy than the copper cabling needed for a traditional LAN.
But can it really be cheaper as well?
You bet!
